name: Rep Goal System (Flexible Sets)
time_per_session_breakdown: Perform multiple sets until target reps reached
overview_and_execution: Pick a total rep target (e.g., 25). Perform as many sets as needed with the same weight until 25 reps are reached. Increase weight once you can reach the target in fewer sets.
example_application: Dumbbell Curl, aim 30 total reps: 15, 10, 5. Next time try 55 lb for sets of ~12, 9, etc.
important_notes: Helps auto-regulate on good/bad days. Keep track of sets to measure progression.
volume_metrics: E.g., total 25-30 reps per exercise per session
